name: Institute of Sociology, Academy of Sciences CR
membership: European Platform of Women Scientists - https://epws.org/
goal: Institute of Sociology is engaged in the pursuit of research into contemporary society and in the provision of post-graduate education in the field of sociology. It conducts ongoing and one-time empirical surveys, comparative research studies, public opinion surveys, and case studies, applying modern qualitative and quantitative research methods, and it also cultivates the development of sociological theory and methodology. Research at the Institute also makes use of information, concepts and methods drawn from related scholarly fields, such as economics, law, political science, demography, social geography, and gender studies.
euInitiatives: Horizon Europe - the Framework Programme for Research and Innovation
